questions.question_text: The year 2100 will be a leap year.
What is the next number in this sequence: 4, 9, 25, 49?
What is the next number in the sequence: 1, 3, 6, 10?
With a given length of string, which 2-D figure would you make with the string so as to maximize the area enclosed by the screen?
What name is given to the ratio of a circle's circumference to its diameter?
